Half-Life 2: Episode One

Positives:
+ Its still half life 2
+ the story telling
+ alyx is by your side almost the entire game
+ the gravity gun
+ great physics
+ great sound
+ funny puzzles
+ good animations
+ the few places thats in "fresh air"

Negatives:
- its short
- alot of corridores and low light
- almost no improvement in graphics
- some parts got me thinking, they just run out of ideas
- some parts are actually a bit boring (!)

The original Half Life 2 is a really great game period.
Episode One made me a bit disappointed to be honest.
Dont get me wrong, its still a good game, but its not great this time.
Luckily episode two is better and more true to the original half-life 2.

Total Score: 7.5/10

Half-Life 2'nin hemen ardından oynamaya başladım ve iki oyun arasındaki o ince farkı anında hissedebildim. Episode One, Half-Life 2'ye göre daha zorlayıcı ve sinir bozucu geldi. Özellikle canavarlarla olan çatışmalar ikinci oyuna göre daha bezdirici olabiliyor. Bunun yanında zorluk açısından tatmin edici olduğu bir gerçek. Bu oyunun karanlık ve gerici havası diğer oyunda pek rastlamadığım noktaydı ve atmosferi, olan olayların sonucunu oyuncuya hissettirme açısından başarılı bir durumdu. Hikaye devamı açısından yeterli oynanış açısından kimilerine göre kısa sayılabilecek bir oyun ama şahsen oynunu bitirdiğimde aldığımı hissettiğim keyif beni tatmin etti. (Bu konuda oyunları ara vermeden oynamamın etkisi olabilir.)
Kısa ama güzel.

Kind of feels like half-life 2+. But really only the worse parts of half-life 2. While episode 2 introduces new things this just continues the current things on. And the start just feels like a cut part from hl2 they moved to here to make this game longer. It's pretty forgettable. You have a boring looking citadel, then some really dark underground section and just some more anti-citizen 1 and follow freeman. Still very good but definitely not very repayable ore good as a stand alone game.

6.5/10

Half-Life Episode 1 is probably the least favorite of the other 4 games. But even when it is least known it still is great. With improved AI in some sort of way and an addon to the story on how Gordon and who hes with escape City 17

It was annoying to go back for an achievement run because of how npc's attack the ant lions and/or something alike. But really that just means the AI is working.

If you were to take a look at the far off background, and are a fan of apocalypse types of art. You would be quiet possibly amazed.

Another incredible NPC escort mission that gets close to overstaying its welcome.

El principio del fin.

[h1]Lo mejor:[/h1] 

- El episodio 1 comienza justo después del final de Half Life 2. La Ciudadela está a punto de volar en mil pedazos y Freeman junto con Alyx deben escapar antes de que la Ciudad 17 sea destruida. Emoción asegurada!
- Aparecen los alizombies, apodados así por nuestra querida Alyx! Son soldados de la Alianza que han sido transformados en zombies. Son más fuertes que los zombies comunes y pueden tener una granada en la mano para volarnos por los aires.
- Debemos resolver ciertos puzzles con la pistola antigravedad como reconstruir ciertos puentes o impedir que sigan saliendo más hormigas león tapando los agujeros de donde salen con autos.
- Existe un logro donde solo tenemos que disparar una única bala en todo el juego, y esa bala es para romper un candado. 
- Casi todo el tiempo iremos con Alyx por la Ciudadela y por Ciudad 17.

[h1]Lo peor:[/h1] 

- Otra vez pasa lo mismo, en las opciones le digo que quiero los subtítulos y no funcionan. Me tuve que bajar la traducción de dlan, activar la consola y después poner un comando para que se activaran los subtítulos.
- En cierto momento nos encontraremos con unos soldados de la Resistencia armados con bazookas pero no hacen nada contra los soldados de la alianza! Que mala onda!
- Al principio del episodio nos atacan soldados de la Alianza pero no podemos sacarles sus armas.
It doesn't achieve the same amount that Half Life: 2 or Half Life: 2 Episode 2 did. But it is an important bridging point between these two games.

[h1] Отзыв на Half-Life 2: Episode One [/h1]

[b] Плюсы: [/b]
[olist]
    [*]Хороший сюжет, просто прексрасный а не как это бывает у других разработчиков, когда первая часть крутая а продолжение уже не очень. [spoiler] Да, да Ubisoft [/spoiler]
    [*]Неплохая графика, приятная для глаз, ничего не режет глазки.
    [*]Геймплей интересный, хоть и на первый взгляд кажется что на один раз но перепройти потом реально хочется.
    [*]Простите конечно, но это моя любимая часть франшизы, и да мой обзор пихаю че хочу.
[/olist]

[u] Переходим к минусам... [/u]

[b] Минусы: [/b]
[olist]
    [*]Самая короткая часть халф-лайф, начинается экшен и конец, хотя взрыв цитадели реально красивый.
[/olist]

[b] Влияние на отзыв в коментариях. [/b]
